sys:positions.title: Member

description: Abhishek Pratap Shah (born 1 October 1982) is a Nepalese politician affiliated with the Nepali Congress. He has served as the Member of Parliament for Kapilvastu 3 since March 4, 2018. Previously, he was a member of the first and second Constituent Assembly of Nepal representing Kapilvastu 5 from 2008 to 2017. His political career began in January 2008 with a nomination to the interim parliament. Over the years, he has been associated with several political parties, including the Rastriya Prajatantra Party (RPP), Madheshi Janaadhikar Forum, Nepal (MJFN), and the Federal Socialist Forum, Nepal (FSFN), before joining the Nepali Congress in 2017.
short_description: Nepalese politician from the Nepali Congress party, serving as a member of parliament for Kapilvastu 3.
